title: Ergodyne ProFlex 925F(x) Impact-Reducing Work Gloves, Large, Lime
features: Maximum back-of-hand impact protection meets superior abrasion resistance, dexterity and grip.
Molded TPR armor for impact protection, pinch injury prevention & blow deflection
5mm EVA dorsal pad & 5mm EVA palm & ulnar padding. Also protects against "chopping" blows
Abrasion-resistant PVC on palm and 3 fingers limits liquid penetration & hi-vis orange for signaling
Reinforced Kevlar palm stitching & non-slip Armortex for enhanced protection, grip & durability
description: Dorsal Impact-Reducing Gloves: Maximum back-of-hand impact protection meets superior abrasion resistance, dexterity and grip.

Whether you're a Roughneck or your neck is strangely smooth, Ergodyne's Dorsal Impact-Reducing series knows hardcore protection like the back of your hand. Try a pair and see just how double live gozno your hands can go. Warriors, come out to play. ProFlex Dorsal Impact-Reducing series gloves come standard with battle-tested protective exoskeletons of ultra-light molded TPR armor, cushy EVA foam and long range reflectivity for hand visibility. Choose extras such as thermal or enhanced cut protection. No matter what, you've got your other backside covered.
